column2: The upper row of numbers in each cell of the table shows results from sham-operated animals (n = 10); the middle results shows striatectomized animals (n= 7); the lower row shows results from striatectomized, hippocampectomized animals (n = 9). * Significant correlation coefficients, p < 0.05. Garibyan and L. S. Gambaryan, Behavior and the Basal Ganglia [in Russian], Erevan (1982).
